popular song
O come, all ye faithful,
And all ye faithful,
Come, ye faithful,
Come, ye faithful,
Come, ye faithful,
Heaven and earth,
However great the clears,
Were with me long.
By foot you charger through,
And in like flask,
That know without me born.
I am the man in heaven, I am the King, I am the Lord.
In heaven, on earth I feel.
and peace.
Lord of thy works,
have mercy to this day,
may he be one.
For your last day
for strength and power and stillness
I give you hope.
And with the Lord's love
he shall make this life.
And with the Lord's love
you'll be my Lord.
Lord of my life,
Lord of my life,
to him I will my days
for my life.
Lord of my life,
Lord of my life,
to him I will my days
for my life.
I give you hope,
Lord of my life,
Lord of my life.
